recommendations.enhance_transportation_services: Address common issues with buses, drivers, and overall travel arrangements to ensure smooth and comfortable journeys.
recommendations.improve_communication: Ensure clear and effective communication at all stages, from planning to execution. This includes responding promptly to questions and providing thorough explanations and recommendations.
recommendations.focus_on_value_for_money: Review pricing strategies to ensure they are perceived as reasonable and fair. Consider offering more transparent pricing information and better value packages.
recommendations.strengthen_customer_service: Invest in training for staff to ensure they are well-equipped to provide exceptional service and handle issues promptly and professionally.
recommendations.streamline_logistics: Pay attention to details in accommodation, scheduling, and logistics to avoid inconveniences and enhance the overall travel experience.
